item.description: On Thursday, March 29, at 7:15p, The Disproof Atheism Society will present "Abraham, Job, & Jesus: The Bible’s Attack on Reason", a discussion in support of the Reason Rally in DC, based on N. Zangwill, “The Myth of Religious Experience,” http://www.dur.ac.uk/..., & M. Piper, “Why Theists Cannot Accept Skeptical Theism,” http://www.springerli.... Location: Rm. 442, BU Photonics Center, 8 St. Mary’s St., Boston. Free & open to all. Info: DASociety@aol.com.
item.name: Abraham, Job, & Jesus: The Bibleâ€™s Attack on Reason
